what: Quickly fits voigt profiles to a signal. — spectralem
title: Quickly fits voigt profiles to a signal. — spectralem
text: Requires starting fit. useful get fast decent fit. algorithm developed produce fast decent fit general non linear optimizers optim fail produce.

title: Quickly fits voigt profiles to a signal. — spectralem
code: spectralem(   x,   y,   max_peaks,   max_iter,   print_progress = TRUE,   add_component_every_iters = 10,   start_peaks = list(pos = c(), gwidth = c(), lwidth = c()),   background_model = list(ComponentTrunctLinear$new()),   placement_strategy = StrategyMaxSmoothLossfield$new() )
